Name: Astrea
Text: Before you set off lets go over some basics.

Name: Astrea
Text: Use WASD in order to move around the world.

Name: Astrea
Text: Good. If you wish to move faster hold SHIFT while moving. This consumes your stanima seen at the bottom left. Don't worry this will refill slowly after you stop running

Name: Astrea
Text: Great! Now, see that dummy over there? Attack it by pressing left click. This takes stamina. Get a few good swings.

Name: Astrea
Text: Excellent, however, you will often face retaliation from monster you intend to attack. Pressing SPACE allows you to dodge enemy attacks, depleting stamina. Practice against these light orbs.

Name: Astrea
Text: Amazing job my knight. Your sufficiently prepared.
